amendment.description: Amendment sought to clarify that nothing in the act limits or otherwise affects the constitutional authority of the executive branch to exercise prosecutorial discretion.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part A of House Report 113-378 to clarify that nothing in the act limits or otherwise affects the constitutional authority of the executive branch to exercise prosecutorial discretion.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Nadler amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 190 - 225 (Roll no. 121).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Nadler.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Nadler amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 190 - 225 (Roll no. 121).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
